name: Titanium.UI.Slider
summary: A slider component with a draggable thumb.

events.name: click
events.summary: Fired when the device detects a click against the view.
events.description:
There is a subtle difference between singletap and click events.

A singletap event is generated when the user taps the screen briefly without moving their finger. This gesture will also generate a click event.

However, a click event can also be generated when the user touches, moves their finger, and then removes it from the screen.

For sliders on Android, the click event is only generated by a trackball click on the slider thumb.

properties.name: y
properties.summary: Y coordinate of the event from the source view's coordinate system.

properties.name: x
properties.summary: X coordinate of the event from the source view's coordinate system.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

properties.name: source
properties.summary: Source object that fired the event.

properties.name: type
properties.summary: Name of the event fired.

events.name: change
events.summary: Fired when the value of the slider changes.

properties.name: value
properties.summary: New value of the slider.

properties.name: thumbSize
properties.summary: Dictionary with properties width and height of the size of the thumb. Available with custom thumb image.

properties.name: thumbOffset
properties.summary: Dictionary with properties x and y of the thumb's left-top corner in the control. Available with custom thumb image.

properties.name: isTrusted
properties.summary: True if change was made by the user. False if change was made programmatically.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

properties.name: source
properties.summary: Source object that fired the event.

properties.name: type
properties.summary: Name of the event fired.

events.name: start
events.summary: Fired when the user starts tracking the slider.

properties.name: value
properties.summary: Current value of the slider.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: False. This event does not bubble.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

properties.name: source
properties.summary: Source object that fired the event.

properties.name: type
properties.summary: Name of the event fired.

events.name: stop
events.summary: Fired when the user stops tracking the slider.

properties.name: value
properties.summary: Current value of the slider.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: False. This event does not bubble.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

properties.name: source
properties.summary: Source object that fired the event.

properties.name: type
properties.summary: Name of the event fired.

methods.name: setValue
methods.description: On iOS, you can specify that the value change should be animated by passing the optional options parameter.

parameters.name: options
parameters.summary: Specifies animation options. The only supported property for this dictionary is the animated flag, which specifies whether the value change should be animated. animated is false by default. Only used on iOS.

properties.name: disabledLeftTrackImage
properties.summary: Image URL of the slider left track when in the disabled state.

properties.name: disabledRightTrackImage
properties.summary: Image URL of the slider right track when in the disabled state.

properties.name: disabledThumbImage
properties.summary: Image URL of the slider thumb when in the disabled state.

properties.name: enabled
properties.summary: Boolean to indicate the enabled state of the slider.
properties.default: Slider is enabled by default (property value may be `undefined`).

properties.name: highlightedLeftTrackImage
properties.summary: Image URL of the slider left track when in the highlighted state.

properties.name: highlightedRightTrackImage
properties.summary: Image URL of the slider right track when in the highlighted state.

properties.name: highlightedThumbImage
properties.summary: Image URL of the slider thumb when in the highlighted state.

properties.name: leftTrackImage
properties.summary: Image URL of the slider left track.
properties.description: See introduction of the Titanium.UI.Slider component for implementation specific information on Android Platform.

properties.name: leftTrackLeftCap
properties.summary: Size of the left end cap for the leftTrackImage, disabledLeftTrackImage, highlightedLeftTrackImage and selectedLeftTrackImage properties.
properties.description:
This property must be set before the track images are loaded. When specified at creation this property is loaded before loading any of the track images

End caps specify the portion of an image that should not be resized when an image is stretched. This technique is used to implement buttons and other resizable image-based interface elements. When an image with end caps is resized, the resizing occurs only in the middle of the image, in the region between the end caps. The end caps themselves keep their original size and appearance. This property specifies the size of the left end cap.

properties.name: leftTrackTopCap
properties.summary: Size of the top end cap for the leftTrackImage, disabledLeftTrackImage, highlightedLeftTrackImage and selectedLeftTrackImage properties.
properties.description:
This property must be set before the track images are loaded. When specified at creation this property is loaded before loading any of the track images

End caps specify the portion of an image that should not be resized when an image is stretched. This technique is used to implement buttons and other resizable image-based interface elements. When an image with end caps is resized, the resizing occurs only in the middle of the image, in the region between the end caps. The end caps themselves keep their original size and appearance. This property specifies the size of the top end cap.

properties.name: max
properties.summary: Maximum value of the slider.
properties.description:
Specifies the value of the slider when the thumb is all the way to the right. This value is inclusive.

On Android, the selectable values can be limited using the minRange and maxRange properties.

On Android this must be an integer value.

properties.name: maxRange
properties.summary: Upper limit on the slider value that can be selected.
properties.description:
If maxRange is specified, value of the slider can't be increased above maxRange.

The total displayed range of the slider is still from min to max.

If undefined, the slider can go all the way to max.

On Android this must be an integer value.

properties.name: min
properties.summary: Minimum value of the slider.
properties.description:
Specifies the value of the slider when the thumb is all the way to the left. This value is inclusive.

On Android, the selectable values can be limited using the minRange and maxRange properties.

On Android this must be an integer value.

properties.name: minRange
properties.summary: Lower limit on the slider value that can be selected.
properties.description:
If minRange is specified, value of the slider can't be decreased below minRange.

The total displayed range of the slider is still from min to max.

If undefined, the slider can go all the way to min.

On Android this must be an integer value.

properties.name: rightTrackImage
properties.summary: Image URL of the slider right track.
properties.description: See introduction of the Titanium.UI.Slider component for implementation specific information on Android Platform.

properties.name: rightTrackLeftCap
properties.summary: Size of the left end cap for the rightTrackImage, disabledRightTrackImage, highlightedRightTrackImage and selectedRightTrackImage properties.
properties.description:
This property must be set before the track images are loaded. When specified at creation this property is loaded before loading any of the track images

End caps specify the portion of an image that should not be resized when an image is stretched. This technique is used to implement buttons and other resizable image-based interface elements. When an image with end caps is resized, the resizing occurs only in the middle of the image, in the region between the end caps. The end caps themselves keep their original size and appearance. This property specifies the size of the left end cap.

properties.name: rightTrackTopCap
properties.summary: Size of the top end cap for the rightTrackImage, disabledRightTrackImage, highlightedRightTrackImage and selectedRightTrackImage properties.
properties.description:
This property must be set before the track images are loaded. When specified at creation this property is loaded before loading any of the track images

End caps specify the portion of an image that should not be resized when an image is stretched. This technique is used to implement buttons and other resizable image-based interface elements. When an image with end caps is resized, the resizing occurs only in the middle of the image, in the region between the end caps. The end caps themselves keep their original size and appearance. This property specifies the size of the top end cap.

properties.name: selectedLeftTrackImage
properties.summary: Image URL of the slider left track when in the selected state.

properties.name: selectedRightTrackImage
properties.summary: Image URL of the slider right track when in the selected state.

properties.name: selectedThumbImage
properties.summary: Image URL of the slider thumb when in the selected state.

properties.name: splitTrack
properties.summary: Separates the thumbImage from the slider track.

properties.name: thumbImage
properties.summary: Image for the slider thumb.
properties.description:
The thumb image can be specified as a URL.

Support for using Titanium.Blob for this property is only available on iOS.

properties.name: tintColor
properties.summary: The color shown for the portion of the progress bar that is filled.
properties.description: This property is a direct correspondant of the tintColor property of UIView on iOS. If no value is specified, the tintColor of the View is inherited from its superview.

properties.name: trackTintColor
properties.summary: The color shown for the portion of the progress bar that is not filled.

properties.name: value
properties.summary: Current value of the slider.
